body_html:
@satok16 Thanks for info, appreciate your help.

I have a follow up question.
API RunInferenceByHexagonControlWrapper() in test section, calls


// For initialisation 
Hexagon_control_wrapper.Init();
Hexagon_control_wrapper.SetUpfGraph();

and similarly 

// For Teardown
Hexagon_control_wrapper.TearDownGrpah()
Hexagon_control_wrapper.Finalize();

Can't we do this once at the startup and shutdown respectively? The reason i am asking, I have a phone camera which is sending images in real-time for inference and for every image i shouldn't be doing this, isn't it? Please correct me if i am wrong. Thanks.
